ie.cognate.sng
Class Adjust

java.lang.Object
  ie.cognate.sng.Adjust
All Implemented Interfaces:
ie.cognate.Modes
public class Adjust
extends java.lang.Object
implements ie.cognate.Modes

Where the major image manipulation happens: glitching, dithering, colour conversion. The image can potentially break after glitching so this has to be accounted for. A new Adjust object is created every time an update to the palette/dither options has been requested too;

Author:
Andrew 4-6-14
